attributes.action: Scrap VAT on household gas, electricity, heating oil, & on the standing charge
attributes.additional_details: VAT is an unfair tax, and the Govt needs to raise revenue by fair, means tested methods that do not have a disproportionate effect on disabled people.
attributes.background:
The cost of energy is set to increase again in October by another 60%, many people are already struggling to pay bills and not everyone qualifies for the uplift. 
VAT has a disproportionate effect on disabled people who rely on equipment that use electricity, & they may not qualify for PIP.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  

Remove VAT on domestic energy bills now: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617418
